stink.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to have a strong and very unpleasant smell
stink.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The toilets stank to high heaven (=stank very much).
stink.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: used to say that something is bad, unfair, dishonest etc
stink.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Don’t eat there – the food stinks!
